title: A XkyKeen1 level pack released!
content:
xky1tuned
Here's a new level pack I made! This is revenge because XkyKeen1 was so good mod, now I'll try to ruin everyone's memory of that mod by bringing in annoying level pack for it. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-mortlol.gif[/img] No, seriously, this is a tribute to a neat mod. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] As well, this is a surprise dedicated to Xky. I haven't told him about this yet (and therefore haven't asked permission [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-embarrassed.gif[/img] ).

Now some screens. These screens could be better, there are hundreds of places that look better than those pictured below.

[img]http://www.keengrid.net/keenrush/tuned1.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.keengrid.net/keenrush/tuned2.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.keengrid.net/keenrush/tuned3.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.keengrid.net/keenrush/tuned4.gif[/img]

The first one to complete all the levels can get year's supply of Gaaarg Cola! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img]

Tell me your comments!

Download here:
[url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip[/url]Yeah.

title: oh wow!
content:
This thing is HARD!!! I really don't like the levels where I have to fall through a 1-tile-wide gap in gears. Those are pretty much impossible for me.

This is a really awesome surprise, though--thanks, KeenRush! :-D I'd forgotten some of the tiles I drew but never used in XkyKeen1... and now I see them!

The only real comment I have is that you didn't use my gears turning in opposite directions--there'll be a line of gears next to each other, all turning in the same way. I made 2 different gears, so that they could alternate clockwise and counterclockwise. :-) Oh well. This is still cool!

title: Re: oh wow!
content:
*Tries*

*Fails*

Aah, Klassic KeenRush.

I'm advantaged as I have just finnished replaying other KK such as episode smile and Yorphius. [And dammit, I want that cola!]

This time I'm counting the deaths [kinda] 514 so far, I'll beat these levels yet! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-pirate.gif[/img] A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: oh wow!
content:
Hehe, thanks!
Xky -- for some reason I always used those others, dunno why. If you can't pass all the levels have you at least checked them in god-mode? Because I think there are nice levels that you should see..

Tell me when you're done LL. *starts hiding Gaaarg Cola*

The bad thing in this 'Release Forum' is that people probably don't check these so often at all and I won't get comments. Or then they're just not interested. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] [url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]

title: Re: oh wow!
content:
A tribute to Xky. Sounds like a plan to me; tribute-community patchwork-mod-for-Xky so he can't deny us his fourth mod.

Oh KR, I'd download if I knew I could at least get past level 1.-----------------
[img]http://www.jamba.nl/storage/view/upload/logo/image_multijpeg/DevilFrogVerwandlung.jpg[/img][img]http://www.jamster.com/s/jiw/img/US_logo_big.gif[/img]
Jamster! rules!

title: hehe
content:
I gave each level a full New Game's worth of lives before turning on God Mode... it's just that, whenever I had to fall through a 1-tile-wide gap of space, that's where all 5 lives went. That level which begins with a drop right into it was the fastest I've ever gotten game over in a Keen game. :-)

I really enjoyed your levels, though. You did an excellent job of varying the traps and tricks the player would have to use. I think it'd still be a satisfying level pack with half the traps in it. It was really nice of you to make a level pack for XkyKeen1. :-D

title: Re: hehe
content: Thanks. Although I'm still quite disappointed, there's only you and LevelLord who have tried and commented it, and Djaser that commented but hasn't tried. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] I was hoping for more!! [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-furious.gif[/img] It was hard work building all that.[url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url] :: [url=http://www.keengrid.net/ckfiles/levels/xky1tuned.zip]xky1tuned.zip[/url]

title: definitely
content: I felt they were all very fun--except the ruthless precision jumping stuff.  I don't find 1-tile-gaps to be fun at all... but the rest of the stuff KeenRush put in here is magnificent!

title: My lives! MY LIVES!!!1! *sobs*
content:

title: this is neat
content:
Now entering level 4...
Piece of Cake (double cocolate) so far, but im sure it's about to get a lot thougher.
Anywayz, I really love this stuff. KeenRush, Im a big fan and I wanna thank you for bringing us this great entertainment. Respect![img]http://img.villagephotos.com/p/2004-8/801878/Ezlogo2.jpg[/img]

title: Re: this is neat
content: Thanks dude, I was already waiting where are you since I remembered you liked my previous work. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]  Yeah, they'll get harder after the first three levels.. good luck![url=http://www.keengrid.net/]keengrid.net[/url]
